feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and commas appropriately to separate clauses and list items.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar level of lexical complexity and word choice, using formal language and technical terms.

feature3.explanation: Both texts have varying sentence lengths and exhibit a similar level of coherence and cohesion.

feature4.explanation: Both texts convey a formal and informative tone, with a focus on presenting logical arguments.

feature5.explanation: There are no spelling or typographical errors in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, there is a high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
